cab.content: This Document is the property of HisBritannic Ha.jesty's Government.TO.BE KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY./It is requested that special care may be taken to ensure the secrecy of this Document.secret.P. (40) 12. COPY NO.YT A R cabinet a R M YEighteenth Weekly Report.(For the period 1st to 7th January, 194-0).1. Ilovement to 3.5.3?.The follov/ing were shipped to B.E.F. from the United Kingdamduring the week :-Personnel 6,650Vehicles 1,174Stores andAmmunition 9-671 tons.Included in the above were:-Headquarters Ho.2 Base Ordnance Depot.Nos. 4, 5 and 6 Ordnance Stores Companies.-Headquarters 2nd S/L Regiment.Nos. 5, 6, 7 and 8 S/L Batteries,Advanced party 48th Division,2, India.600 mules from India in charge of 150 Indian drivers arrived in Marseilles on 6tli January. Tlae Cypriot drivers destined to takecliarge of these mules are due to arrive in Marseilles on 8th January -when the Indian drivers will return to India. This completes the concentration of the animal transport for the B.E.F.3. Moves in progress.95th Anti-Adrcraft Regiment to Orkneys.436th Searchlight Battery to Orkneys.The War Office,9th January, 1940.
